game.ai.shared.view.specification

Interface IGameView

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.Observer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GameView

    public interface IGameView
extends java.util.Observer
    This class is an interface of View. It defines some constants to paint the View
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    btdiem
